short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just Invite helps you to invite your friends for your group or like your page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't waste your time by clicking one by one buttons to send invites to your friends to like your page or join your group. Because this tool is going to make your life easier, by making this process automated.
